name: Tomb Heist
description:
Global Game Jam 2019 - A game about stealing treasure and slapping people! Enter Tutankhamun's home and raid his many treasures. Make it back out alive with the loot in your van, and perhaps you'll be able to bring it back home!

Jam Site: 
Breda University of Applied Sciences

Jam Year: 
2019

Diversifiers: 
Always Room for One More (Sponsored by Origin Access)
Language-Independence (Sponsored by Valve Software)
Scale With A Song

Platforms: 
MS Windows

Tools And Technologies: 
Unreal Engine

Technology Notes: 
UE 4.21.2

Credits: 

Rick Meeuwes - Design / Programming

Goran de Ruiter - Design / Programming

Gilian van Spaendonk - Programming 

Trinh Nguyen - Design / Art

Maria Rukavitsa - Art

Sjoerd Limberger - Audio

https://youtu.be/hgOhMVsvhXM
